name: rare-bone
short_effect: Sell for 5000 Pokédollars, or to Bone Man for 10000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.black_white: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.
